attributes.action: Ask the electorate whether or not they want close ties with the US
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I for won say independence is best, but joint cooperation is not such a bad thing. Please sign this petition if you wish UK government decisions to be made devoid of US interference / demands.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
